name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Cloud Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, particularly in cloud environments. Proficient in **Linux**, **Cloud** services including **Azure** and **AWS**, and well-versed in **CI/CD** processes and **Automation** strategies, ensuring efficient deployment and management of applications. Demonstrated expertise in **Scripting** and **Monitoring** systems to enhance operational efficiency and reliability. Experienced in **Virtualization** and **Networking**, facilitating secure and scalable environments for enterprise solutions. 

Skilled in modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with comprehensive knowledge in the full stack including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Leveraged microservices architecture and event-driven systems to develop maintainable solutions compliant with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. 

Brings practical experience in MLOps—from developing ML pipelines to managing production workflows utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about building systems that are not only technically proficient but also drive real-world impact.
